question: Qualitative data is better than quantitative data
correct_answer: False: No one method is better than the other for all cases
incorrect_answers: True: You need to ensure quality of data gathered
False: Statistics and numbers are more factual
True: Observations are more reliable for interfacing

question: A laboratory experiment...
correct_answer: needs to be reproducible and unbiased
incorrect_answers: requires a scientific lab for data gathering
should only be used for quantitative data gathering
